head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DEROSA, ANGELA SOPHIA (NEE LUCIA)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DEROSA, ANGELA SOPHIA (NEE LUCIA)

block.p: DeROSA--Angela Sophia (nee Lucia), on June 2nd, 2007. Devoted wife of the late Anthony John. Beloved mother of Diane Angela. Cherished sister of Eleanor Zinno. Friends may call at the Andrett Funeral Home, 353 Second Avenue (at 20th Street), NYC Tuesday 2-5 and 7-9pm. There will be a 7:30 pm chapel service at the funeral home on Tuesday. Interment Wednesday 11:30am at Ferncliff Cemetery.
